Gulp-ES15-boilerplate

EcmaScript 2015-compatible web development boilerplate & Gulp pipeline

By Jacob Pedersen | GitHub Email

Usage Explaining the pipeline Q&A

Boilerplate? Wasn't gulp meant to be as easy to use as possible?
At this point, I have no idea. Gulp is certainly a powerful, flexible & dynamic way to construct your pipeline, but it's not a small thing to set up.
Which is why I made this! Features include:

  • EcmaScript 2015 to EcmaScript 5 transpiler
  • Minification & optimization of: JavaScript, CSS & HTML
  • Optimization & compression of images
  • SASS and automatic prefixing for CSS
  • Bundling of many javascript files into one via Webpack
  • Easy to use, seperated gulp plugin option maps
  • Clean, documented gulpfile.js
  • Tries to be lightweight on depedencies (it's not easy)
  • `dist/` folder should be ready for deployment after a run of `gulp dist`
